import React, { useState } from "react"; import { motion } from "framer-motion"; import { User, Lock, Bell, Eye, Globe, ShieldCheck, Save, Trash2, Camera } from "lucide-react"; const SettingsPage: React.FC = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('account'); const tabs = [ { id: 'account', label: 'Account', icon: User }, { id: 'security', label: 'Security', icon: Lock }, { id: 'notifications', label: 'Notifications', icon: Bell }, ]; return (
